message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you and I'm willing to part with it for $20,000.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $16,000.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but the product is worth a lot to me. How about we meet in the middle at $18,000?
I appreciate your flexibility, but I was thinking more along the lines of $15,500.
